title.rendered: Tastebudz Peanut Butter Cookies Strain Autoflower Seeds

content.rendered:
Tastebudz Peanut Butter Cookies Strain: Autoflowering Feminized Cannabis Seeds

Elevate Your Collection with a Unique Flavor Experience
Tastebudz Peanut Butter Cookies Auto is a flavour-packed autoflowering strain that merges the sweet, nutty essence of Peanut Butter Cookies with the hardy, fast-finishing traits of Ruderalis genetics. The result is an exotic and smooth-smoking experience with deeply relaxing effects and effortless structure. Thanks to its Ruderalis lineage, this strain offers quicker turnaround times, enhanced resilience, and a compact size — making it ideal for those seeking rich flavour, ease, and reliability in one powerful package.

Indulge in a Perfect Blend of Relaxation and Enjoyment
With its potent THC content of 23%, this strain provides the ultimate balanced high — relaxing the body and soothing the mind without leaving you feeling too sedated. It’s ideal for both unwinding at the end of the day or indulging in a moment of serenity while staying mentally alert.

Taste Profile that Tells a Story
The flavor is a delicious combination of rich, nutty peanut butter with a creamy sweetness, evoking the comfort of a peanut butter cookie fresh from the oven. It’s a treat for the taste buds, with each puff offering a smooth and satisfying taste.

Perfect for Collectors Seeking Something Unique
With an easy-to-enjoy, balanced effect and a delectable flavor profile, this strain is perfect for collectors looking to explore a new, high-quality addition to their collection. Ideal for those who appreciate cannabis with a touch of indulgence and relaxation.

📊 Peanut Butter Cookies Strain Specs

Feature Details
Genetics Peanut Butter Cookies x Ruderalis
Strain Type 60% Indica Dominant Autoflower Feminized
Flowering Time 8-9 Weeks (Autoflowering)
Indoor Yield Up to 550-650 gr/m²
Outdoor Yield Up to 750 gr/plant
THC Content Up to 23%
Flavours Nut Cookie Gas, Vanilla Cream
Aromas Toasted Sugar, Earthy Undertones
Effects Relaxing, Euphoric, Balanced Body & Mind

🍯 Flavour & Aroma Of Peanut Butter Cookies Strain

Tastebudz Peanut Butter Cookies strain is packed with rich, dessert-style flavours, blending smooth vanilla dough, toasted nut, and a subtle fuel-like kick on the exhale. Its layered terpene profile — featuring Humulene, Alpha Cedrene, and Alpha Terpineol — brings both sweetness and complexity to the experience. Expect a full-bodied aroma that lingers in the air and delivers on taste with every pull.

✨ Potency & Effects Of Peanut Butter Cookies Strain

With a remarkable THC level of 23% and a 60% Indica dominance, Peanut Butter Cookies Strain delivers a perfect balance between deep relaxation and enduring, powerful effects. It’s your ticket to unwinding and finding tranquility after a long day. The euphoric yet relaxing effects are ideal for evening use or relaxation-focused activities.

🌱 Seed Collector Notes

Peanut Butter Cookies Auto produces compact, medium-height plants with dense, trichome-rich buds. It’s a great addition to any autoflower collection thanks to its rapid lifecycle, consistent structure, and dessert-like flavour payoff. Indoor collectors can expect yields of up to 550-650 g/m², while outdoor setups may see up to 750 g per plant in optimal conditions.

💨 Why Choose Peanut Butter Cookies Strain?

✔️ Indica-dominant strain, ideal for relaxation
✔️ Easy to grow with rapid flowering time
✔️ Delicious nutty and sweet flavours for flavour-first collectors
✔️ Potent effects with up to 23% THC content
✔️ High yields up to 750g/plant outdoors
✔️ Suitable for both novice and expert collectors
🌱 Free seeds with every order
📦 Free UK shipping on orders over £50
✈️ Direct tracked shipping to the USA available
🌍 Available worldwide through official retailers

❓ Frequently Asked Questions – Peanut Butter Cookies Strain

  1. What is the THC content of Peanut Butter Cookies Strain?
    The THC content of Peanut Butter Cookies is up to 23%, offering a balanced and powerful high.
  2. What effects should I expect from Peanut Butter Cookies Strain?
    You can expect a relaxing, euphoric high that is perfect for unwinding or easing stress.
  3. How long does it take for Peanut Butter Cookies Strain to flower?
    The strain has a flowering time of 8-9 weeks, making it an ideal autoflowering strain for quick harvests.
  4. How does Peanut Butter Cookies Strain taste?
    Peanut Butter Cookies offers a rich, layered flavour profile — combining creamy vanilla dough and hints of nut. It’s a dessert-style strain with a deep gassy edge, perfect for those who enjoy indulgent, flavour-fuelled autos.
  5. Is Peanut Butter Cookies Strain suitable for beginners?
    Yes! It is easy to grow and offers high yields with minimal effort, making it great for both beginners and experienced seed collectors.
  6. Is there a photoperiod version of the Peanut Butter Cookies strain available?
    Yes! For collectors who prefer photoperiod feminized cannabis seeds, check out the photoperiod version of Peanut Butter Cookies by Tastebudz Syndicate.
